mapper.insert: INSERT INTO IMAGE (noticeNO,image1, image2, image3, image4, image5, image6,image7,image8,image9,image10) VALUES(#{noticeNO},#{image1}, #{image2}, #{image3} , #{image4}, #{image5}, #{image6}, #{image7}, #{image8} , #{image9}, #{image10})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM IMAGE where noticeNO=#{noticeNO} or travelNO=#{travelNO} or reviewNO=#{reviewNO} or promotionNO=#{promotionNO} or eventNO=#{eventNO}
